text: aur yadi aap, unase prashn karen ki kisane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko? to ve avashy kahenge ki allaah ne. aap kahiye ki tum batao, jise tum allaah ke siva pukaarate ho, yadi allaah mujhe koee haani pahunchaana chaahe, to kya ye usakee haani door kar sakata hain? athava mere saath daya karana chaahe, to kya ye rok sakate hain usakee daya ko? aap kah den ki mujhe paryaapt hai allaah aur useepar bharosa karate hain, bharosa karane vaale
